name: Bit Escape
description:
Have you ever heard of an Escape Room? 

No?.... well...you are in a location... and you have to escape it! It's that simple!

There are plenty of puzzle to be solved , be sure to read everything because it may be a clue and above all, put your mind to the test and have fun! 

This game was made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3 in 1 week.

And be sure to tell us your time in the Comments bellow  :D

Controls  

  • X - Inventory 
  • Z - Interact and Start the Game
  • Arrows / WASD - Moviment the cursor
  • Q/E - Change Room
  • Esc - Leave Close ups

*Remember to use an item it must be selected in the Inventory*
